mapper.select:
select ri.id, ri.user_id, ri.content, ri.to_user_id, ri.create_date, ri.school_id, ss.name as schoolName, ss.city, ss.province, ss.manage, ss.`level`, ui.name as userName, ui.id_card, ui.`type`, ui.sex, ui.images from reply_info ri left join sys_school ss on (ss.id = ri.school_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = ri.user_id) where 1 = 1
AND ss.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{replyInfo.schoolName},'%')
AND rilevel LIKE CONCAT('%',#{replyInfo.level},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{replyInfo.userName},'%')
order by ri.create_date desc

select ri.id, ri.user_id, ri.content, ri.to_user_id, ri.create_date, ri.school_id, ss.name as schoolName, ss.city, ss.province, ss.manage, ss.`level`, ui.name as userName, ui.id_card, ui.`type`, ui.sex, ui.images from reply_info ri left join sys_school ss on (ss.id = ri.school_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = ri.user_id) where 1 = 1 AND ri.school_id = #{schoolId} order by ri.create_date desc
